name: The Ministro Foundation
briefDescription: The Latin word ‘Ministro’ means to serve, help, assist, etc. and we are here to do just that! The Ministro Foundation exist to:-	Effect new opportunities-	Enhance capacities-	Enable the building of individuals and societyWe at Ministro believe that the need of the hour is the Education and life development for the younger generation, women and the poor. We seek to help, serve and assist with this group especially in the areas of education, health and livelihood.
